docstring: This is the place where you can describe the complete module or dataset and give information about all the details. Markdown offers a convenient way to enable as much space as needed to elucidate purpose and capabilities of your data model.

description.description: Describes the content of the dataset.

subject.description: Subject of matter linked to the dataset

reactionmodules.description: Flow modules in the reaction part of the process

analysismodules.description: Flow modules in the analysis part of the process

capillaryconnections.description: A Capillary connection between two flow modules

Dataset.docstring: This is the root of the data model and contains all objects defined in this example. While its good practice to have a single root, you can define as many roots as you like. Furthermore, the name does not have to be ```Root``` and can be any other name.

name.description: Full name including given and family name

affiliation.description: To which organization the author is affiliated to

Author.docstring: This is another object that represents the author of the dataset. Please note, that the options here contain all required fields but also custom ones. In this example, the ```Dataverse``` option specifies where each field should be mapped, when exported to a Dataverse format. Hence, these options allow you to link your dataset towards any other data model without writing code by yourself.

start.description: A unique ID of a Flowmodule (reaction / analysis) that should be findable in the flow scheme

end.description: A unique ID of a Flowmodule (reaction / analysis) that should be findable in the flow scheme

inner_diameter.description: Inner diameter of the Capillary connection in mm

length.description: Length of the Capillary connection in mm

CapillaryConnection.docstring: This section should provide all details about the capillary connections of the setup.

id.description: A unique id that should be findable in the flow scheme

manufacturer.description: Name of the manufacturer of the device

type_number.description: Exact type number given by the manufacturer of the device

manual_link.description: Possibility to get the manual of the device

operation_mode.description: Operation mode of the Flow module

FlowModule.docstring: This section should provide all details about the equipment of the setup.

description.description: A description of the purpose of the module.

ReactionModule.docstring: This section should provide all details about the equipment of the setup.

description.description: A description of the purpose of the module.

AnalysisModule.docstring: This section should provide all details about the equipment of the setup.
